data.text: @smidget4778 @starcasm @Teresa_Giudice Yeah, tell that to ice agents doing this to other families as we speak!! Even those with NO criminal record!!
@starcasm @Teresa_Giudice While I agree he did wrong, taking him away from his girls is a mistake, they need their dad, there has to be a alternative other than ripping him away from his girls.

@starcasm @Teresa_Giudice This little man thought he was so tough.
#AdiosAmigo
